channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Data Grid 8.4.4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Data Grid 8.4.4

item.title: CVE-2023-3629|2024-08-20T14:48:20.992Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20data%20grid%208.4.4
item.description: A flaw was found in Infinispan's REST, Cache retrieval endpoints do not properly evaluate the necessary admin permissions for the operation. This issue could allow an authenticated user to access information outside of their intended permissions.

item.title: CVE-2023-3628|2024-08-20T14:48:04.583Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20data%20grid%208.4.4
item.description: A flaw was found in Infinispan's REST. Bulk read endpoints do not properly evaluate user permissions for the operation. This issue could allow an authenticated user to access information outside of their intended permissions.
